item.description:
Slip on your lederhosen -- it's time to pay homage to fun and revelry, German-style!

Jacob Wirth will be pouring Oktoberfest steins for us (and other styles, too), as well as offering complimentary appetizers for meat-eaters and vegetarians.

Friends are welcome!

See you there,
Alicia

P.S. French Oak TV may be in the house (er, bar) to film a short segment on Boston's craft beer scene. If you don't want to be on camera, no worries. It's going to be completely voluntary!
item.name: Oktoberfest Meetup
